tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    bio TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    challenge_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    distance FLOAT,
    time_taken INTERVAL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE ar_challenges (
    challenge_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    challenge_name VARCHAR(100),
    difficulty_level INT,
    creator_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tracking_data (
    tracking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    challenge_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    tracking_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    completion_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (challenge_id) REFERENCES ar_challenges(challenge_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    profile_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE challenge_tracking (
    track_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    challenge_id UUID REFERENCES challenges(challenge_id),
    started_at TIMESTAMP,
    completed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE user_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    challenge_id INT,
    challenge_date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE challenge_data (
    challenge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    challenge_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    challenge_category VARCHAR(50),
    difficulty_level VARCHAR(20),
    max_attempts INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    challenge_id INT REFERENCES challenge_data(challenge_id),
    progress_status VARCHAR(20),
    progress_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
    reward_name VARCHAR(50),
    reward_type VARCHAR(50),
    reward_date DATE
);
